tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I am writing to express my sincere gratitude and high recommendation for Dr. Supreeth. My experience under his care has been exceptional, marked by his unparalleled expertise, compassionate demeanor, and unwavering dedication to patient well-being.

From my initial consultation, Dr. Supreeth took the time to thoroughly understand my condition, explain the diagnosis in clear terms, and outline a comprehensive treatment plan. His ability to communicate complex medical information in an accessible and reassuring manner was immensely comforting.

Throughout the course of my treatment, Dr. Supreeth consistently demonstrated a high level of professionalism and attentiveness. He was always available to address my concerns, and his prompt responses to my queries greatly alleviated any anxieties I had. The meticulous attention to detail in his approach ensured that I received the best possible care.

Moreover, the entire staff at Apollo Clinic, Kundanahalli, Bangalore mirrored Dr. Supreeth‚Äôs commitment to excellence. The team was courteous, efficient, and always willing to go the extra mile to ensure a positive patient experience. From the seamless scheduling of appointments to the warm and welcoming atmosphere of the clinic, every aspect of the service was exemplary.

Thanks to Dr. Supreeth‚Äôs care and Dr. Gaurav‚Äô s expert care, I have experienced significant improvement in my condition and am on the path to a full recovery. I am incredibly grateful for his dedication and highly recommend Dr. Supreeth to anyone seeking top-notch orthopedic care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I recently consulted Dr. Supreeth for persistent hand pain, and I am extremely satisfied with the care I received. From the very first appointment, Dr. Supreeth was thorough in his examination and took the time to understand my daily routine and activities. His approach was comprehensive, and he quickly identified that my pain was due to deficiencies in vitamin D and vitamin B12.

What sets Dr. Supreeth apart is his accessibility and willingness to help beyond the clinic. He was readily available on WhatsApp for any questions I had, which made a significant difference in managing my condition. Additionally, he provided personalized recommendations for vitamin-rich foods, ensuring that I could incorporate them into my diet easily.

Dr. Supreeth's expertise, combined with his patient-centric approach, has greatly improved my condition. I highly recommend him to anyone seeking an orthopaedic doctor who goes above and beyond to ensure their patients' well-being.

review: Dr. Supreeth is a really friendly *** ************* ******* He explained the reason behind the excruciating pain at my thumb. He suggested natural therapies and other treatment options in case the pain does not subside. I am truly greatful to him for his advise. Thank you, Dr. Supreeth.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I am extremely grateful to Dr. Supreeth for his clear explanation of my problem and for prescribing the appropriate medications. Thanks to his expertise, I discovered my vitamin deficiency early, which could have become a significant issue if left undiagnosed. His professionalism and thorough approach have made a big difference in my health and well-being.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I recently visited Dr. Supreeth for my cervical pain, and I am extremely satisfied with the care I received. Dr. Supreeth patiently listened to all my concerns and thoroughly answered every queries I had. Instead of just treating the symptoms, he took the time to understand my daily routine to identify the root cause of my pain.What truly stood out was his approach to my vitamin deficiency. In addition to prescribing medication, Dr. Supreeth recommended a variety of vitamin-rich foods to include in my diet. This holistic approach not only addressed my immediate pain but also contributed to my overall well-being.I highly recommend Dr. Supreeth for anyone seeking a caring and meticulous medical professional.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My kid fell down and he was unable to move is hand. We consulted Supreeth sir, as he was the only doctor available that time. He is explained the problem clearly and give treatment to my kid(it was misalignment of four arm bone). Working 15 min my kid was able to move and hand recovered from pain in a hour. Thank you very much Supreeth sir.

review: I recently visited Dr. Supreeth for an ankle ligament sprain, and I couldn't be happier with the care I received. Dr. Supreeth is incredibly calm and understanding, always welcoming with a smile and motivating words. Thanks to his expert treatment, my ankle is recovering well, and I'm able to walk again. He took the time to listen to my concerns and provided thorough explanations, which alleviated my fears. Dr. Supreeth creates a comfortable environment where you can openly share your issues. Additionally, I enjoyed practicing Kannada with him during my visits hehe.... He is not only an exceptional orthopedic doctor but also a wonderful human being. Highly recommend!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
My recent visit to the doctor for lower back pain was very informative and reassuring. The doctor was incredibly helpful in explaining the potential origins of my lower back pain and discussed various factors that could contribute to the discomfort, including possible lifestyle habits and work-related activities.To better understand the root cause of the issue, the doctor recommended both an X-ray and an MRI scan.In addition to diagnostic tests, the doctor prescribed medication to alleviate the immediate pain and discomfort.

One aspect that stood out during the visit was the preventive measures. The doctor explained maintaining a proper sitting posture, especially given the sedentary nature of many modern lifestyles.  Importance of specific exercises in my daily routine to strengthen the muscles supporting the lower back, to ultimately reducing the risk of future pain.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Visited Dr. Supreeth for my daughter's sports injury in hand. Doctor examined her carefully and patiently. Luckily xray showed no fracture. Doctor did a supportive bandage and gave minimal medication. she's better now. Would definitely recommend him.Thank you.

review:
Had a really good experience with Dr Supreeth. I was going a little heavy with leg excercises due to which a pain started to happen in my right knee whenever I use to go downstairs or put a little pressure.

After going through a lot of reviews I thought of visiting Dr. Supreeth as he seemed a lot more active not only on practo but helping other patients with there questions on other platforms.

He deligently checked and examined my knee and suggested me knee excercises and Vitamin D3 with Calcium. I have been following it regularly, it has been 15 days and pain has reduced a lot.

All in all I'll from my personal experience would recommend Dr. Supreeth. Thank You once again sir for the treatment.

review: Visited doctor Supreeth for my hip pain, due to which I was unable to walk. He explained my problem in simple lay man language and confirmed that it is indeed sero negative arthritis. He ruled out any problem in my spine by examining and suggested me few stretching exercises and life style changes to reduce the frequency of arthritis attack. He didn't prescribe any new medicines and asked me to continue the ones which I already have for my arthritis. He spent enough time and cleared all my doubts regarding the arthritis pain. Thank you doctor.
